definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: The existing vaccines can only reduce the amount of virus, rather than totally inactivating it.
sentences.chinese: 當前的疫苗只會減少病毒數量，並非真正殺滅病毒。

sentences.english: And in Shushan the palace the Jews slew and destroyed five hundred men.
sentences.chinese: 在書珊城，猶大人殺滅了五百人。

sentences.english: Objective To study the microbicidal effect of hyperoxidation ion water.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究強氧化離子水對微生物的殺滅效果。

sentences.english: Effect is quick and highly. It has reliable destroying and inhibiting effect to all kinds of coccidial.
sentences.chinese: 作用迅速高效，對各種球蟲都有很好的殺滅作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Jieyuan gel bait on killing Blattella germanica.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察潔園滅蟑餌劑現場殺滅德國小蠊的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the molluscieidal effect of Areca catechu on Oncomelania hupen-sis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察檳榔提取物殺滅釘螺的效果。

sentences.english: I will draw my sword and my hand will destoroy them.
sentences.chinese: 我要拔出刀來，親手殺滅他們。

sentences.english: Conclusion TTO has obvious inactivating effect on PV in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 結論TTO對懸液中的PV有明顯的殺滅作用。

sentences.english: In addition, the human use of other drugs also, such as sulfa drugs to kill bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 另外，人類還用其他藥物，比如磺胺類藥物殺滅細菌。

sentences.english: The ionisation radiation has to each arrogant living thing eliminates the function.
sentences.chinese: 電離輻射對各種傲生物都有殺滅作用。

sentences.english: They disinfested their house of cockroaches.
sentences.chinese: 他們殺滅他們房子裏的蟑螂。

sentences.english: Assassin Swift Blade has already murdered two secret society leaders.
sentences.chinese: 殺手快刀手已經殺滅黑勢力的兩個首領。

sentences.english: The parasiticidal effects of superhigh pressure were studied for Trichinella Spiralis larvae.
sentences.chinese: 應用超高壓技術，對旋毛蟲肌幼蟲進行殺滅作用研究。

sentences.english: The other 4 kinds of insecticides can't c…
sentences.chinese: 其餘4種農藥不能達到快速殺滅紅火蟻的要求。

sentences.english: Therefore long-time and effective oxidation reaction and bacteria killing is available.
sentences.chinese: 因此能長時效進行氧化反應，並殺滅細菌。

sentences.english: In the meantime, zinc is ionic also but with the bacterium medium enzymatic happening reaction exterminates a bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 同時，鋅離子也可與細菌中的酶發生反應殺滅細菌。

pinyin: you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
